name: Lior Wolf
content: Lior Wolf Prof. Lior Wolf I am a faculty member at the School of Computer Science at Tel Aviv University. Before, I was a postdoc working with Prof. Poggio at CBCL, MIT. I received my PhD working with Prof. Shashua at the Hebrew U, Jerusalem Address: Schreiber Building, room 212, Tel Aviv University, P.O.B. 39040, Ramat Aviv, Tel Aviv 69978 Lab: The lab located at the ICRC building.
